'''Sapientia Oromasdis Chapter''' is the [[Story Quest]] chapter for  [[Nahida]].

==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[Lingering Warmth]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;1;Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises|display=bullet|requirements=1}}
* Act II - [[Homecoming]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;1;Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises|display=bullet|requirements=1}}

==Summary==
===Act I - Lingering Warmth===
{{Main|Lingering Warmth}}
{{Description|The [[Akasha]] has stopped functioning, the city of scholars is no longer fanatical about pursuing knowledge, and the right to dream has been returned to [[Sumeru]]'s citizenry.<br>All of a sudden, dreams &mdash; erstwhile "old friends" that have become novelties &mdash; are the talk of the town in [[Sumeru City]].<br>Even those poker-faced crocodiles must yawn sometimes. Now is the perfect time to loosen up and listen to their chit-chat!}}
{{Transclude|Lingering Warmth|Summary}}

===Act II - Homecoming===
{{Main|Homecoming}}
{{Description|In the [[Sanctuary of Surasthana]] lies a crystal of unknown origin, which holds a promise destined to remain unfulfilled.<br>In the long river of time, all beings are but passers&ndash;by. Humans and gods create history, but even they cannot ensure that these stories will not be forgotten by generations to come.<br>"Why are we born? What do we love? Why can't we let go?"<br>Listen to the answer of the oldest, yet also the youngest being in the world.}}
{{Transclude|Homecoming|Summary}}
